member.name: T:Cake.Incubator.DotNetBuildExtensions.DotNetBuildSettingsExtensions
member.summary: Several extension methods when using DotNetBuildSettings.

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.DotNetBuildExtensions.DotNetBuildSettingsExtensions.WithTargets(Cake.Common.Tools.DotNet.MSBuild.DotNetMSBuildSettings,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Adds multiple .NET build targets to the configuration.
member.returns: The same instance so that multiple calls can be chained.
member.example:
Add many targets to the build settings
var settings = new DotNetMSBuildSettings().WithTargets(new[] { "Clean", "Build", "Publish" });

member.summary: Performs an action on a collection of items

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.EnumerableExtensions.EnumerableExtensions.IsNullOrEmpty``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Checks whether specified IEnumerable is null or contains no elements
member.returns: true if element null or empty, else false
member.example: Replace collection == null || !collection.Any() with collection.IsNullOrEmpty()

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.EnumerableExtensions.EnumerableExtensions.IsNullOrEmpty``1(System.Collections.Generic.IList{``0})
member.summary: Checks whether specified IList is null or contains no elements
member.returns: true if element null or empty, else false
member.example: Replace collection == null || collection.Count == 0 with collection.IsNullOrEmpty()

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.EnumerableExtensions.EnumerableExtensions.IsNullOrEmpty``1(``0[])
member.summary: Checks whether specified array is null or contains no elements
member.returns: true if element null or empty, else false
member.example: Replace collection == null || collection.Length == 0 with collection.IsNullOrEmpty()

The type of the key to search for.

The key that is being searched for.

member.summary: Filters FilePathCollection by filenames, in the order specified
member.param: the file names to filter by
member.returns: the filtered list

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.FileExtensions.FileExtensions.LoadXml(Cake.Core.IO.IFile)
member.summary: Loads an xml file
member.returns: An XDocument

Load an xml document
XDocument doc = GetFile("./proj.csproj").LoadXml();

member.name: T:Cake.Incubator.FilePathExtensions.FilePathExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods for working with 's

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.FilePathExtensions.FilePathExtensions.IsSolution(Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Checks if the FilePath is a solution file
member.returns: true if sln file
member.example:
Check if the file is a solution
new FilePath("test.sln").IsSolution(); // true

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.FilePathExtensions.FilePathExtensions.IsProject(Cake.Core.IO.FilePath)
member.summary: Checks if the FilePath is a vbproj/csproj/fsproj file
member.returns: true if a visual studio project file was recognised

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.FilePathExtensions.FilePathExtensions.HasFileName(Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the path has a specific filename and extension
member.returns: true if filename and extension matches
member.example:
Check by the filename (includes extension)
new FilePath("/folder/testing.cs").HasFileName("testing.cs"); // true

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.FilePathExtensions.FilePathExtensions.HasFileExtension(Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the path has a specific file extension (case-insensitive)
member.returns: true if file extension matches
member.example:
Check the file extension with or without the period ignoring case
new FilePath("/folder/testing.cs").HasExtension(".cs"); // true new FilePath("/folder/testing.odd").HasExtension("ODD"); // true

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.Authors
member.summary: dotnet pack: A list of packages authors, matching the profile names on nuget.org. These are displayed in the NuGet Gallery on nuget.org and are used to cross-reference packages by the same authors.

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.BuildOutputTargetFolder
member.summary: dotnet pack: Specifies the folder where to place the output assemblies. The output assemblies (and other output files) are copied into their respective framework folders.

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.ContentTargetFolders
member.summary: dotnet pack: This property specifies the default location of where all the content files should go if PackagePath is not specified for them. The default value is "content;contentFiles".

member.summary: Copyright details for the package.

member.summary: The assembly or package company

member.summary: True if compilation will output debug symbols

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.DebugType
member.summary: The debug type (portable, embedded, full)

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.DefineConstants
member.summary: Build pre-processor directives

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.DelaySign
member.summary: When delay signed, the project will not run or be debuggable

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.Description
member.summary: dotnet pack: A long description of the package for UI display.

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.DocumentationFile
member.summary: The documentation file path

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.DotNetCliToolReferences
member.summary: The dotnet CLI tool references, a collection of

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.FileVersion
member.summary: The File Version

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.GenerateDocumentationFile
member.summary: True if assembly will generate xml documentation

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.GeneratePackageOnBuild
member.summary: True if the package will be generated when building

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.GenerateSerializationAssemblies
member.summary: Generate serialization assemblies (Off, On, Auto)

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.IncludeSymbols
member.summary: dotnet pack: This Boolean value indicates whether the package should create an additional symbols package when the project is packed. This package will have a .symbols.nupkg extension and will copy the PDB files along with the DLL and other output files.

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.IncludeSource
member.summary: dotnet pack: This Boolean value indicates whether the pack process should create a source package. The source package contains the library's source code as well as PDB files. Source files are put under the src/ProjectName directory in the resulting package file.

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.IncludeBuildOutput
member.summary: dotnet pack: This Boolean values specifies whether the build output assemblies should be packed into the .nupkg file or not.

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.IncludeContentInPack
member.summary: dotnet pack: This Boolean value specifies whether any items that have a type of Content will be included in the resulting package automatically. The default is true.

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.IsPackable
member.summary: dotnet pack: A Boolean value that specifies whether the project can be packed. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.IsTool
member.summary: dotnet pack: Specifies whether all output files are copied to the tools folder instead of the lib folder. Note that this is different from a DotNetCliTool which is specified by setting the PackageType in the .csproj file.

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.IsWeb
member.summary: True if this is a web project

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.LangVersion
member.summary: Assembly language version (ISO-1, ISO-2, [C#]2-7)

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.MinClientVersion
member.summary: dotnet pack: Specifies the minimum version of the NuGet client that can install this package, enforced by nuget.exe and the Visual Studio Package Manager.

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.NetStandardImplicitPackageVersion

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.NeutralLanguage

member.name: P:Cake.Incubator.Project.NetCoreProject.NoPackageAnalysis
member.summary: dotnet pack: Specifies that pack should not run package analysis after building the package.

member.summary: The pragma warnings to ignore during compilation

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.IsWebApplication(Cake.Incubator.Project.CustomProjectParserResult)
member.summary: Checks if the project is a web application.
member.returns: true if the project is a web application

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.GetExtension(Cake.Incubator.Project.CustomProjectParserResult)
member.summary: Returns the parsed projects output assembly extension
member.returns: the output assembly's file extension

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.GetAssemblyFilePath(Cake.Incubator.Project.CustomProjectParserResult)
member.summary: Gets a parsed projects output assembly path
member.returns: the output assembly path
member.example:
Returns the absolute project assembly file path, respects build config and platform settings
CustomParseProjectResult project = ParseProject(new FilePath("test.csproj"), "Release"); project.GetAssemblyFilePath(); // returns '/root/project/bin/release/test.dll'
NOTE: This does not currently support how runtime identifiers affect outputs

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.GetAssemblyFilePaths(Cake.Incubator.Project.CustomProjectParserResult)
member.summary: Gets a parsed projects output assembly paths for mulit-targeting projects
member.returns: the output assembly paths
member.remarks: NOTE: This does not currently support how runtime identifiers affect outputs

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.IsType(Cake.Incubator.Project.CustomProjectParserResult,Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectType)
member.summary: Checks the parsed projects type
member.returns: true if the project type matches
member.remarks: Project Types are not supported in NetCore, this extension is for the Net Framework only

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.HasPackage(Cake.Incubator.Project.CustomProjectParserResult,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks for a project package reference by name and optional TargetFramework
member.param: the target framework, if not specified, checks all TargetFrameworks for the package
member.returns: True if package exists in project, otherwise false
member.example:
Checks if the project has an NUnit package
CustomParseProjectResult project = ParseProject(new FilePath("test.csproj"), configuration: "Release", platform: "x86"); bool ref = project.HasReference("NUnit"); // true bool ref = project.HasReference("NUnit", "net45"); // false

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.HasReference(Cake.Incubator.Project.CustomProjectParserResult,System.String)
member.summary: Checks for a project assembly reference by name or alias
member.returns: True if reference exists in project, otherwise false

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.GetPackage(Cake.Incubator.Project.CustomProjectParserResult,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a project package reference
member.param: the specific targetframework, if not specified, returns the package for any TargetFramework
member.returns: The package reference if found

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.HasDotNetCliToolReference(Cake.Incubator.Project.CustomProjectParserResult,System.String)
member.summary: Checks for a DotNet Cli Tool Reference by name
member.returns: True if reference exists in project, otherwise false

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.GetDotNetCliToolReference(Cake.Incubator.Project.CustomProjectParserResult,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a project DotNetCliToolReference
member.returns: The dotnet cli tool reference if found

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.GetReference(Cake.Incubator.Project.CustomProjectParserResult,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a project assembly reference by name or alias
member.returns: the project assembly reference if found

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.GetProjectProperty(Cake.Incubator.Project.CustomProjectParserResult,System.String)
member.summary: Gets any project property by name. Useful for getting non-standard properties in the CustomProjectParserResult type
member.returns: the project property value if found

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.ParseProject(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.String)
member.summary: Parses a csproj file into a strongly typed object using the specified build configuration and default platform (AnyCpu)
member.returns: The parsed project
member.remarks: Defaults to 'AnyCPU' platform, use overload to override this default
member.example:
Returns the project information specific to a build configuration
CustomParseProjectResult project = ParseProject(new FilePath("test.csproj"), configuration: "Release");

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.Project.ProjectParserExtensions.ParseProject(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parses a csproj file into a strongly typed object using the specified build configuration and target platform
member.returns: The parsed project

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.XDocumentExtensions.XDocumentExtensions.GetFirstElementValue(System.Xml.Linq.XDocument,System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: gets the first matching element value, if a config is passed, it will only match an element with the specified config and platform condition. the platform defaults to AnyCPU
member.param: the platform to match, default is AnyCPU
member.returns: the matching element value if found

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.XElementExtensions.XElementExtensions.GetFirstElementValue(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: gets the first matching element value, if a config is passed, it will only match an element with the specified config and platform condition. the platform defaults to AnyCPU
member.param: the platform to match, default is AnyCPU
member.returns: the matching element value if found

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.XElementExtensions.XElementExtensions.WithConfigCondition(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: checks the element for a config condition attribute. If not found, also check the parent
member.param: the optional config value to match
the optional platform value to match
member.returns: true if a matching condition is found

member.name: M:Cake.Incubator.XElementExtensions.XElementExtensions.Attribute(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.Xml.Linq.XName,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the first (in document order) attribute with the specified .
member.param: If set to true case will be ignored whilst searching for the .
member.returns: A that matches the specified , or null.
